title: You're a Jellyfish!
description: Have you ever wondered what it would feel like to float weightless through the ocean? Or what it might be like to have no bones in your body? You will know after you read You're a Jellyfish! Through easy-to-understand text and detailed photographs, you might even feel as though you really are a jellyfish!
meta: bask, budding, cloned, frilly, invertebrates, marine, medusas, planula, polyp, social, tentacles
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand text
Narrative Point of View : Analyze narrative point of view in text
Vowel Diphthong : Identify the vowel diphthong ou
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a series
Syllable Patterns : Identify and understand syllable patterns

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
